title: SoC RTVF 360-0-22 Topics in Media Writing

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will explore: What are some of the current issues facing the LGBTQIA community? Which of the groups within this community are the most underrepresented? Where is LGBTQIA headed in terms of television/theater, and what could the future hold? How do you tell a story that centers around LGBTQIA characters using the context of theatre/ TV ? Students will leave this course with a revised draft of a one act play, or half hour television episode.
